english.segment1: Went to t.o. for the weekend. Backstage passes for the show. Muddy shoes, fresh tattoos and a brand new feel- ing. That tonight will be alright we're letting go
english.segment2: How does it feel just to know that we're out of our minds. And we don't need a reason. How does it feel to know you're alright. How does it feel just to know that we are alive. There ain't no better reason. We can make it to- night everything is alright
english.segment3: Distant dreams, a trillion questions. And we exaggerate them all. We think the teens in magazines they have all the answers. As we build this machine to watch it fall
english.segment4: How does it feel just to know that we're out of our minds. And we don't need a reason. How does it feel to know you're alright. How does it feel just to know that we are alive. There ain't no better reason. We can make it to- night everything is alright
english.segment5: How does it feel to know you're alright. We can make it tonight, we can make it tonight
